dcterms:creator: James Colyar
John Halkias
dcterms:description: The NGSIM dataset, specifically the US-101 and I-80 subsets, offer a rich source of real-world traffic scenarios and driver behaviors, gathered from two distinct locations in California. It provides a comprehensive perspective of the surrounding environment with millions of data samples captured in a bird’s-eye view at 10 Hz.
dcterms:title: NGSIM

dcterms:creator: Vinit Katariya
Ghazal Alinezhad Noghre
Armin Danesh Pazho
Hamed Tabkhi
dcterms:description: Carolina’s Highway Dataset (CHD) is a comprehensive collection of vehicle trajectory data extracted from videos recorded in various locations across North Carolina and South Carolina, USA. It includes two distinct viewpoints: eye-level and high-angle, providing trajectory information and annotations for multi-vehicle detection and tracking.
dcterms:title: Carolina’s Highway Dataset (CHD)

dcterms:creator: Vinit Katariya
Ghazal Alinezhad Noghre
Armin Danesh Pazho
Hamed Tabkhi
dcterms:description: Carolina’s Highway Dataset (CHD) High-angle provides vehicle trajectory data recorded from a high-angle viewpoint, offering insights into vehicle behaviors and interactions in traffic scenarios.
dcterms:title: CHD High-angle

dcterms:creator: Vinit Katariya
Ghazal Alinezhad Noghre
Armin Danesh Pazho
Hamed Tabkhi
dcterms:description: Carolina’s Highway Dataset (CHD) Eye-level provides vehicle trajectory data recorded from an eye-level viewpoint, capturing a different perspective on vehicle behaviors and interactions in traffic scenarios.
dcterms:title: CHD Eye-level
